title: I Became a Regulatory Official for the Poaching of Monsters, but the Rescued Monsters are trying to Eat Me - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Fantasy Creatures   Fantasy World   Transported to Another World
author: Tobino Yu   飛野猶
description:
Taketo fell out of a plane while on a business trip.

The place that he fell into was another world where monsters roamed free.

Here, he is rescued by a mysterious girl called Shante, who rides a giant fenrir. And he decides to work as a Regulatory Official, in order to protect the monsters from poachers.

What monsters will he encounter on his journey!

Many monsters will appear in every chapter!>
